name: STRAW-19
description:
You bought the brand new STRAW-19 roomba to do some cleaning. But you didn't know that STRAW stands for "Simply Turn Right At Walls", and that's all it does. Your mission is to guide it to still get everywhere. 

  • 18 levels of varying difficulty
  • fully playable with mouse only
  • all levels selectable from the start
  • lasers

October 2019

Known issue: In some special cases a few specific textures seem to go missing. I will try to get this fixed, a restart of the game should help for now.
